</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>// Adjust "speedLimit" variable to change limited speed. (A3 1.24 we don't need loop for a continus effect, [[limitSpeed]] alone is enough.)

	[[while]] {[[canMove]] _this} [[do]] {
		_this [[limitSpeed]] (_this [[getVariable]] "speedLimit");
